thread.title: Bluebird thrills the crowds, 90 years after setting world record
thread.title_full: Bluebird thrills the crowds, 90 years after setting world record | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Bluebird thrills the crowds, 90 years after setting world record
text:
Play video It was once the fastest car on earth - topping 150mph. That was 90 years ago and to mark the anniversary Bluebird, based at the National Motor Museum at Beaulieu, was today taken out for a celebratory spin. Bluebird was back at Pendine Sands in South Wales where the record was set. But today it was more of a gentle stroll for a grand old lady. David Wood reports.
Last updated Tue 21 Jul 2015 Travel
